Text: OMG, the avarage speed is 1-2 kB/s!!! Where're seeders??

This game has some serious flaws, I've got more than enough hardware to run this scrap, and yet I'm having serious graphical issues like slowed down gameplay (even on lowest settings), seeing blurred screens with eifel tower cutouts and shit.. This is probably the worst console to pc port I've seen in a long time >.
